47 namespace moveit {

49 namespace stages {
50 
51 GenerateGraspPose::GenerateGraspPose(const std::string& name) : GeneratePose(name) {
52  auto& p = properties();
53  p.declare<std::string>("eef", "name of end-effector");
54  p.declare<std::string>("object");
55  p.declare<double>("angle_delta", 0.1, "angular steps (rad)");
56 
57  p.declare<boost::any>("pregrasp", "pregrasp posture");
58  p.declare<boost::any>("grasp", "grasp posture");
59 }
60 
61 void GenerateGraspPose::init(const core::RobotModelConstPtr& robot_model) {
62  InitStageException errors;
63  try {
64  GeneratePose::init(robot_model);
65  } catch (InitStageException& e) {
66  errors.append(e);
67  }
68 
69  const auto& props = properties();
70 
71  // check angle_delta
72  if (props.get<double>("angle_delta") == 0.)
73  errors.push_back(*this, "angle_delta must be non-zero");
74 
75  // check availability of object
76  props.get<std::string>("object");
77  // check availability of eef
78  const std::string& eef = props.get<std::string>("eef");
79  if (!robot_model->hasEndEffector(eef))
80  errors.push_back(*this, "unknown end effector: " + eef);
81  else {
82  // check availability of eef pose
83  const moveit::core::JointModelGroup* jmg = robot_model->getEndEffector(eef);
84  const std::string& name = props.get<std::string>("pregrasp");
85  std::map<std::string, double> m;
86  if (!jmg->getVariableDefaultPositions(name, m))
87  errors.push_back(*this, "unknown end effector pose: " + name);
88  }
89 
90  if (errors)
91  throw errors;
92 }
93 
94 void GenerateGraspPose::onNewSolution(const SolutionBase& s) {
95  planning_scene::PlanningSceneConstPtr scene = s.end()->scene();
96 
97  const auto& props = properties();
98  const std::string& object = props.get<std::string>("object");
99  if (!scene->knowsFrameTransform(object)) {
100  const std::string msg = "object '" + object + "' not in scene";
101  if (storeFailures()) {
102  InterfaceState state(scene);
103  SubTrajectory solution;
104  solution.markAsFailure();
105  solution.setComment(msg);
106  spawn(std::move(state), std::move(solution));
107  } else
108  ROS_WARN_STREAM_NAMED("GenerateGraspPose", msg);
109  return;
110  }
111 
112  upstream_solutions_.push(&s);
113 }
114 
115 void GenerateGraspPose::compute() {
116  if (upstream_solutions_.empty())
117  return;
118  planning_scene::PlanningScenePtr scene = upstream_solutions_.pop()->end()->scene()->diff();
119 
120  // set end effector pose
121  const auto& props = properties();
122  const std::string& eef = props.get<std::string>("eef");
123  const moveit::core::JointModelGroup* jmg = scene->getRobotModel()->getEndEffector(eef);
124 
125  robot_state::RobotState& robot_state = scene->getCurrentStateNonConst();
126  robot_state.setToDefaultValues(jmg, props.get<std::string>("pregrasp"));
127 
128  geometry_msgs::PoseStamped target_pose_msg;
129  target_pose_msg.header.frame_id = props.get<std::string>("object");
130 
131  double current_angle = 0.0;
132  while (current_angle < 2. * M_PI && current_angle > -2. * M_PI) {
133  // rotate object pose about z-axis
134  Eigen::Isometry3d target_pose(Eigen::AngleAxisd(current_angle, Eigen::Vector3d::UnitZ()));
135  current_angle += props.get<double>("angle_delta");
136 
137  InterfaceState state(scene);
138  tf::poseEigenToMsg(target_pose, target_pose_msg.pose);
139  state.properties().set("target_pose", target_pose_msg);
140  props.exposeTo(state.properties(), { "pregrasp", "grasp" });
141 
142  SubTrajectory trajectory;
143  trajectory.setCost(0.0);
144  trajectory.setComment(std::to_string(current_angle));
145 
146  // add frame at target pose
147  rviz_marker_tools::appendFrame(trajectory.markers(), target_pose_msg, 0.1, "grasp frame");
148 
149  spawn(std::move(state), std::move(trajectory));
150  }
151 }
152 } // namespace stages
153 } // namespace task_constructor
154 } // namespace moveit
